meanings: (길·구멍 등을) block (up), obstruct, close, head off; (구멍 등을) stop (up), fill (in)
(일·행동 등을) stop, prevent, keep, head off; (금지하다) forbid
운전 중의 지시 We're blocked in by another car.
운전 중의 지시 Another car is in the way.
운전 중의 지시 A car is blocking our car in.
운전 중의 지시 Your car is in the way.
실용회화-기본대화 I'm sorry. I was in your way.
실용회화-엘리베이터 이용 Sorry, I was blocking the front.

vlive.korean: 마이크 막고 있는 것 같다고요? Am I covering the mic? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 11 🦊
내가 마이크를 막고 있었구나. I was covering the mic. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [연정] 뎡탄절 브이앱이 왔어요💕
나 이제 마이크 안 막고 있어. I'm not covering the mic anymore. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [연정] 뎡탄절 브이앱이 왔어요💕
vlive.english: I'm not covering the mic anymore.

vlive.korean: 내가 뭘로 막고 있는 거지? 카메라를? Am I blocking this? Camera? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : ♡
듣고있는 거예요 - 막고있는 거 아니죠? I'm listening! - You're not covering them? 듣기 View video OSEN : '스타로드' 우주소녀, 마지막까지 훈훈한 팀워크 #EP 12
vlive.english: I'm listening! - You're not covering them?

examples.korean: The police were halting traffic on the parade route. 발음듣기 경찰이 퍼레이드 행렬이 지나갈 길에 차량 진입을 막고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The police were halting traffic on the parade route. 발음

examples.korean: Riot police with shields were blocking the demonstrators’ way. 발음듣기 방패를 든 폭동 진압 경찰이 시위대들의 진로를 막고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Riot police with shields were blocking the demonstrators’ way. 발음

examples.korean: A parked car was obstructing the highway. 발음듣기 주차된 자동차 한 대가 그 공공 도로를 막고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A parked car was obstructing the highway. 발음

examples.korean: Mind out—you’re in the way there! 발음듣기 좀 비켜 서. 네가 길을 막고 있잖아! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mind out—you’re in the way there! 발음

examples.korean: The abandoned car was causing an obstruction. 발음듣기 그 버려진 승용차가 도로를 막고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The abandoned car was causing an obstruction. 발음
